description: Curated portfolio of creative works from the eight-organ creative-institutional system, with emphasis on ORGAN-II (Poiesis) generative art, performance, and interactive media

works.title: Metasystem Master
works.description: Interactive performance system bridging audience participation and generative art. ORGAN-II flagship that orchestrates real-time audiovisual synthesis through audience-responsive feedback loops, transforming live performance into collaborative generative composition.

works.title: A MAVS OLEVM
works.description: Immersive audiovisual environment exploring recursive sensory feedback. ORGAN-II flagship that generates evolving sonic and visual landscapes through layered algorithmic processes, creating an environment where observer and observed merge into a single generative loop.

works.title: Example Generative Music
works.description: Generative music system applying recursive compositional principles to algorithmic sound creation. Produces evolving musical structures that balance deterministic form with emergent variation, demonstrating how self-similar patterns generate coherent musical narratives.

works.title: Performance Documentation System
works.description: Infrastructure for capturing, archiving, and re-presenting live performance works. Provides structured documentation workflows that treat the documentation artifact itself as a creative output, bridging ephemeral performance and persistent record.

works.title: Showcase Portfolio
works.description: Meta-recursive portfolio aggregation engine — this very system that collects, organizes, and renders creative works across all eight organs. A software artwork whose subject is the act of curating artworks, embodying the self-referential architecture of the ORGAN system.

works.title: Art from Auto-Revision Epistemic Engine
works.description: Interactive artwork that treats governance and revision processes as artistic material. Visualizes how institutional knowledge evolves through iterative self-correction, rendering organizational epistemology as dynamic generative art.

works.title: Art from Narratological Algorithmic Lenses
works.description: Interactive narrative visualization that applies computational narratology to reveal hidden story structures. Transforms abstract narrative theory into tangible visual and interactive experiences, letting users explore the architecture of storytelling itself.

works.title: Artist Statement Generator
works.description: AI-assisted tool for generating contextual artist statements that reflect the theoretical grounding of each ORGAN-II work. Combines natural language generation with domain-specific art vocabulary to produce statements that are themselves a form of literary art.

works.title: Recursive Engine
works.description: Self-modifying generative entity system exploring computational recursion as both methodology and metaphor. ORGAN-I flagship that serves as the theoretical foundation underpinning all generative processes across the ORGAN system.

works.title: Narratological Algorithmic Lenses
works.description: Computational narratology framework for analyzing story structures through algorithmic decomposition. Provides the theoretical apparatus that ORGAN-II artworks translate into experiential form.
